greetings.p_1: I'm so glad to see you here!
greetings.p_2: My name is Seraphin and I created this app to share my adventures with my family and friends.
greetings.p_3: I wanted to give an easy view on where I was and what I saw.
greetings.p_4: This app is very new and you're one of the first users. So, please let me know what you think and how I can improve this app to make it useful to you.
greetings.p_5: Follow me on twitter @itermeum to be the first to know about new features!

1.title: Create a map
1.description: Go to "My Maps" and click on "Add a map" to create your first map.

2.title: Add an adventure
2.description: Click on your map and click anywhere on the map to add your first adventure.

3.title: Share your map
3.description: Click on "Share this map" and send the link to your friends and family to share your adventures.
